tool_description: Returns random conversation starters from a huge database. Literally, Nothing else.
name: Conversation Starter
title: Conversation Starter

api_list.name: Random Question
api_list.description: Returns a random conversation starter question
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://conversation-starter1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "conversation-starter1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://conversation-starter1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
